briefTitle: A Phase 3 Molluscum Contagiosum Efficacy and Safety Study
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Vehicle-Controlled, Parallel Group Study Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of SB206 and Vehicle Gel Once Daily in the Treatment of Molluscum Contagiosum
summary: This is a phase 3 multi-center, randomized, double-blind, vehicle-controlled, parallel group study to be conducted in up to approximately 850 subjects 6 months of age and older with molluscum contagiosum (MC). Subjects or their caregivers will apply SB206 10.3% or Vehicle Gel once daily for a minimum of 4 weeks and up to 12 weeks to all lesions identified at Baseline and new treatable lesions that arise during the course of the study.

primaryOutcome.measure: Complete Clearance of All Treatable MC at Week 12
